scripts.build: electron-rebuild --arch=ia32 && electron-packager ./ --app-copyright="Copyright (C) 2016-2017 Ilya Fedin. All rights reserved." --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=../autoflash.ico --out=../ --asar.unpack="{*.exe,*.bin}" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Ilya Fedin" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Autoflasher for E3372" --win32metadata.InternalName="autoflash.exe" --win32metadata.ProductName="Autoflasher for E3372" --win32metadata.OriginalFilename="autoflash.exe" && electron-rebuild
